headline: Extra Space Storage Inc. Announces 2nd Quarter 2025 Dividend
summary: Extra Space Storage Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: EXR) announced today that the Company's board of directors has declared a second quarter 2025 dividend of $1.62 per share on the common stock of the Company. The dividend is payable on June 30, 2025, to stockholders of record at the close of business on June 16, 2025.
